subject: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
Metro Plaza, Plot 991/992
Zakari Maimalari Street
Cadastral Zone AO,
Central Business District, Benin.
Dear Scam Victim,
The BRITISH High Commission in Benin Republic received a report of scam
against you and other British/US citizens and Malaysia, Etc. The countries of
Benin Republic, Nigeria, Bokinafaso and Ghana have recompensed you following
the meeting held with the four countries' Government and various countries'
high commission for the fraudulent activities carried out by the four
countries' Citizens.
Your name was among those scammed as listed by the Benin Financial Intelligent
Unit (BFIU). Compensation has been issued out in Bank draft to all the
affected victims and has been already been in distribution to all the
bearers. Your Bank draft was among those that were reported
undelivered as at on Friday and we wish to advise you to see to the
instructions of the Committee to make sure you receive your draft immediately.
NFIU further told us that the use of Benin Country was abolished due to
interception activities noticed in the above mentioned courier services in
Benin and thereby have made a concrete arrangement with the UPS Courier Company
for a safe delivery to your door-step once the beneficiary meets up the demand
of the conveyance ( 
bhcommission8@gmail.com
 )
We advise that you do the needful to make sure the BFIU endorse your payment
this time. Be advised that you should stop further contacts with all the fake
lawyers and security companies who in collaboration scammed you. Furnish us
with the following details to satisfy you for the Compensation.
Full Name: ..........................
Home address:..................
Country:..............................
Mobile number:..................
Age: ......................................
A copy of your identification is also needed:
Contact immediately to check if the endorsement date suits you.
Yours in Service,
Ms. Linda Brown
CONSULAR,

subject: Re:   BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
Dear Ms. Linda Brown,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the scam report. I appreciate your concern and assistance in this matter. Can you please provide me with more information about the fraudulent activities that were carried out by citizens of Benin Republic, Nigeria, Burkina Faso, and Ghana? I would like to understand the situation better.

Also, could you explain how the Bank draft was issued to the affected victims? What is the process for receiving it? I want to make sure that everything is done correctly and securely.

Lastly, what specific details do you need from me in order to proceed with the endorsement of my payment? I want to ensure that I provide you with the necessary information without compromising my personal security.

Thank you again for your help.

Best wishes,
Felix

subject: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
Dear good day how is your family hope they fine, send us your correct home
address and your correct phone number and your occupation with your country
Name,

We wait to hear from you soon asp

Thank best regard
Mr Richard

subject: Re: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
Dear Mr. Richard,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. My family is doing fine, thank you for asking.

I appreciate your request for my home address, phone number, occupation, and country name. However, I'm curious to know why you need this information. Could you please provide more details about the purpose of collecting these details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Felix

subject: Re: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
When our agent want to delivery your consignment box to your home address,

So that they will not be any mistake

Okay that's what we need from you

Thank best regard

subject: Re: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring a smooth delivery of my box. Could you please provide me with some more details about the delivery process? How long will it take for the box to reach my home address? And are there any specific instructions or documents that I need to be aware of? Thank you in advance for your assistance!

Best wishes,
Felix

subject: Re: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
Our agent will release the document that cover your consignment box

All you need to do now is to send us your full information

Thank best regard

subject: Re: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in releasing the document that covers my box. However, before I provide any personal information, could you please clarify a few things for me?

1. Which agent will be handling the release of the document?
2. Can you provide more details about the document and what it covers?
3. Is there any specific reason why my full name is required?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Felix

subject: Re: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body: When our agent arrived to your country he will know your name

subject: Re: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm curious, why does your agent need to know my name when they arrive in my country? Can you please provide more information about the purpose of their visit?

Best wishes,
Felix

subject: Re: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body: Dear try to understand this question is too much

body:

Best wishes,

body: Send us your full information to enable us proceed

body:

Please my Dear I am very busy here in our office okay if you ready send us
what we ask you to send thank

body:
Your phone number with your country and your occupation with your full
information

We are waiting to hear from you soon asp

subject: Re: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your eagerness to connect. However, I'm a bit cautious about sharing personal information online. Could you please tell me a little more about why you need my phone number, country, and occupation? I'd be happy to help if I can.

Best wishes,
Felix

subject: Re: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
Please stop to email us any more okay

We don't have this can of chance

subject: Re: BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm sorry if there has been any confusion, but we are actually not trying to offer you any chance or opportunity. We simply wanted to share some information with you that we thought might be of interest.

If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to let us know. We're here to help!

Best wishes,
Felix
